original_text: ‘The Lord himself will fight against your enemies and their own slaves will rob them. Then you will know that the Lord Almighty has sent me, Zechariah, to you.’
korean_text: 내가 손을 그들 위에 움직인즉 그들이 자기를 섬기던 자들에게 노략거리가 되리라 하셨나니 너희가 만군의 여호와께서 나를 보내신 줄 알리라

sentences.original_text: The Lord himself will fight against your enemies
and their own slaves will rob them
that the Lord Almighty has sent me
